https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/umIMULio6NgXY76GQeBO5G0VqRM.jpg Comprised of images shot by amateur photographers and German soldiers in the Balkans from the twenties through the forties, BALKAN INVENTORY was begun by Gianikian and Ricci Lucchi in response to the tragedy unfolding in the former Yugoslavia.
